thread.section_title: AMOMA.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von AMOMA.com | www.amoma.com
thread.title: Victor Gregorie

author: Victor Gregorie
title: Victor Gregorie
text:
There are many flags signalling a bad experience with this company.
First, I didn't realize I was booking through them or I wouldn't have.
Second, there was no cancellation fee until I received their "confirming" email...$60.
Third, the hotel after 28 days does not have a reservation for me.
Fourth, I've been on hold with "Customer Service" for 40 minutes, so far!
Fifth, I'm disputing all charges with my credit card company and filing a fraud complaint with the appropriate US Government Agency.
Use this company at your peril.
